mapper.update: create database if not exists gnss default character set = 'utf8'

create table if not exists customer ( id int auto_increment, name varchar (20), password varchar (20), authority int , email varchar (50), enable tinyint (1), firstname varchar (20), lastname varchar (20), company varchar (20), telephone varchar (20), limitdate date, primary key(id), unique key name(name) )
create table if not exists user_authority( name varchar(20), downloadRinex tinyint(1), downloadVirtual tinyint(1), solution tinyint(1), additionalFeature tinyint(1), primary key(name) )

create table if not exists download_log( id int auto_increment, type int not null, user varchar(20) not null, downloadDate date, dataDate date, startTime time, endTime time, version varchar(10), station varchar(20), primary key(id) )
create table if not exists record( recordDate date, register int, downloadRinex int, downloadVirtual int, primary key(recordDate) )
